Class HangmanConsole

  • java.lang.Object
    • HangmanConsole

  • public final class HangmanConsole
extends Object
    Class HangmanConsole includes a static main method that reads a dictionary of words to be used during the game, then plays a game with the user via the console.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Dr. Jody Paul

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DICTIONARY_FILE
      Location (filename) of dictionary file.
      static boolean SHOW_COUNT
      Whether or not to show the number of word choices.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private HangmanConsole()
      Ensure no visible constructor for this utility class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void main(String[] args)
      Driver to run the hangman game.
      static void playGame(Scanner console, HangmanManager hanager)
      Plays one game with the user.
      static void showResults(HangmanManager hanager)
      Report the results of the game, including showing the answer if appropriate.
